KnowledgeBase.Title: addi
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: addi divi muli subi iadd isub imul idiv

Function.Description: The addi function returns the sum of its arguments as an Integer quantity.

Brief.Overview: The addi function returns the sum of its arguments as an Integer quantity. The addi function accepts any numeric operand and performs any necessary type conversions prior to performing the addition.
Brief.Usage: Use the addi function to add two or more numbers and return the result an Integer. The addi function will truncate any fractional portion of its operands before adding. An alternative function, the iadd function, is faster function, but does not perform any type conversions or type checking.

Syntax.Return: Returns the result of the add operation.
